abstract: The steps by Toyota came as a U.S. safety agency is testing the GX 460 for the same handling issues that prompted Consumer Reports to issue a safety warning.
snippet: The steps by Toyota came as a U.S. safety agency is testing the GX 460 for the same handling issues that prompted Consumer Reports to issue a safety warning.
lead_paragraph: DETROIT — Toyota said on Thursday that it was testing the safety of all its sport utility vehicles and had suspended sales of the Lexus GX 460 in markets beyond the United States, where sales were halted this week.

headline.main: As U.S. Tests the Lexus GX 460, Toyota Ceases Selling It Worldwide
headline.print_headline: As U.S. Tests the Lexus GX 460, Toyota Ceases Selling It Worldwide

keywords.value: Sports Utility Vehicles and Light Trucks

keywords.value: LEXUS DIVISION OF TOYOTA MOTOR SALES USA
